message.body: happy friday
very happy friday
how you doin?
ok. busy
I want my sunglasses back! >.<
haha, should have thought of that before you left em :-)
one time I left my sunglasses at a friends bbq, then they went away, then I went away. It took over a month to get em back...
and here I was all excited because I managed to hang on to them for an entire year
I forget where I was when I realized I had forgotten them, probably in west chester or wilmington
if you're desperate, I could mail them.
you could use the box I sent the shoe in...haha
that box is looong gone.
I'm actually wearing those shoes today, lol
I was j/k, its no big deal...but I do want them back damnit
hahah, they're in a safe spot. waitin for ya
yup, til the next time I help you with renovations =|
I was just thinking how when we first met, we saw each other like 3 times in a week. I think we've seen each other about 3 times since then
It's amazing how things can change
well...yea
or I'd like to at least see your place. I do want to make it down at some point.
I would venture to say that "change" is kinda my doing...I tend to be an all or none person, very on, then very off.
or I should say, what I am "very on" to changes...

in many ways, you have been a "change" for me. It's something that I have learned to appreciate very much, if not find confusing at times. When you get back from your trip and settled, I would very much like a visit from you.
life should be slowin down at that point.
so yeah, we'll have to set it up.
gotta run...client time!
